mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.status AS "status", a.request_doctor_id AS "requestDoctorId", a.request_date_time AS "requestDateTime", a.super_doctor_id AS "superDoctorId", a.parent_doctor_id AS "parentDoctorId", a.other_doctor_id AS "otherDoctorId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mr_on_line( id, patient_id, status, request_doctor_id, request_date_time, super_doctor_id, parent_doctor_id, other_doctor_id, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{patientId}, #{status}, #{requestDoctorId}, #{requestDateTime}, #{superDoctorId}, #{parentDoctorId}, #{otherDoctorId}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mr_on_line SET patient_id = #{patientId}, status = #{status}, request_doctor_id = #{requestDoctorId}, request_date_time = #{requestDateTime}, super_doctor_id = #{superDoctorId}, parent_doctor_id = #{parentDoctorId}, other_doctor_id = #{otherDoctorId}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
